Articles.Content:
Hi, 

I am playing on steam and often I will do a contract that will light up green in all categories but refuses to complete.
Can you post a screenshot of the situation, please?

How do I do that?

I'm not that great with these computer things. Better with a hammer.

A good rule of thumb when it comes to computer things is that google search is your friend. First result for "ksp how to take a screenshot", hope this helps ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/28342-How-does-one-Take-a-screenshot](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/28342-How-does-one-Take-a-screenshot)

This depends on the contract, if it asks you to activate a part via staging or the rightclick menu you'll need to do that *while* the contract items are still green ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Bug.

When I plant a flag at the base and then want to finish the mission it won't. It did allow me to revert the mission but that took me back to a previous save which was not an auto save, they don't appear to work. It went to an hour earlier.

Steam, the platform you don't upgrade like the free ones.

While you are at it, the save ship does not work.

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> Bug. Screen frozen all actions don't work. Happens a lot on steam. Please start a game on staem and go through the massive bugs you have on the ground site menus.

I have just had another of the just won't do anything crashes.

I posted the screen shot to public access on steam. With the above caption.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-23T11:56:42Z" title="02/23/2015 11:56  AM" data-short="9 yr">February 23, 2015</time> by Tim\_the\_Plumber**

> 
> I posted the screen shot to public access on steam.

I would strongly recommend posting screenshots *here,* and better descriptions of the problem(s), if you want people to be able to help you. Steam is a purchase a delivery mechanism and has nothing to do with KSP's development or support - the mods aren't going to go and track down a picture you left *somewhere* on the internet ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Just up loaded 2 more crashed pics. What joy!!!

I paid for this game.

It would take you 1 day to go through the space center bit and sort this crap out.

- - - Updated - - -

How do i get pictures from Steam to here then!!
Please see the sticky threads and post your image URL's and game logs ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Just up loaded 2 more crashed pics. What joy!!!
> I paid for this game.
> 
> It would take you 1 day to go through the space center bit and sort this crap out.
> 
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> How do i get pictures from Steam to here then!!

I don't wish to appear rude but you appear to be doing enough for the both of us.

I am on steam I cannot work out how the .... you get a digital image from steam to anything else.

My name on steam is TIMGRINDLEY. They are set for public viewing. 

Is it just me or is steam the issue?

[http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=398161728#_=_](http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=398161728#_=_)

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> I don't wish to appear rude but you appear to be doing enough for the both of us.

You have taken money for this.

Tim\_the\_Plumber, we do not understand what your issue is, please try to explain more carefully.

We will also need your output\_log.txt, please see the sticky threads for information on providing this.

OK, The link will take you to a screen shot.[http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfile...=398161728#_=_](http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=398161728#_=_)

This is of a locked screen which will not go anywhere much except sometimes it goes to a failure type with another box with green writing in it.

If you can go to the steam site there are lots of various bugged out screen shots. 

Is it me or steam or what? 

I am very frustrated because your game is superb at the complex stuff but the whole menu bit on the ground seems to have been forgotten for the career mode especially. 

Would it be a good idea for you to go into steam on my account? You could experience it all then?

What would an out\_put\_log\_text look like when I have had to use control alt delete to get out?

 KSP\_win\KSP\_Data\output\_log.txt -OR- KSP\_win64\KSP\_x64\_DATA\output\_log.txt 

Is it at all possible for me to get to these if I am using steam?

[http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198162300851/screenshots/?appid=220200&sort=oldestfirst&browsefilter=myfiles&view=imagewall](http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198162300851/screenshots/?appid=220200&sort=oldestfirst&browsefilter=myfiles&view=imagewall)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-24T16:32:52Z" title="02/24/2015 04:32  PM" data-short="9 yr">February 24, 2015</time> by Tim\_the\_Plumber**

Well, first I recommend ensuring your files are not corrupted by right clicking KSP in the steam client, selecting "Properties", then the "Local files" tab.

Click "Verify Integrity of Game Cache" to repair KSP.

Test the game, if it still has problems click "Browse Local Files" in Steam, open "KSP\_Data" and find your output\_log.txt

Open that file, copy the contents to [pastebin.com](pastebin.com) and post the link to it here.

We can't determine much more without that info, sorry.

OK, Done that.

[http://pastebin.com/](http://pastebin.com/)

Tim\_the\_Plumber1 is the title I have given it. 

Ah. hang on what's that switch. Try this;

[http://pastebin.com/p40HQZX0](http://pastebin.com/p40HQZX0)

The verify game thing said that everything was fine.

The output\_log.txt is overwritten each time the game is started, so in order for the file to show any error messages you will need to reproduce the bug, and then send a log.

From the log you posted there is no information to suggest what occurred.

Please try again and hopefully we'll catch something in the log that tells us what is going on ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

OK. I'll restart and do it as soon as it crashes.

There are saved games which have saved in a crash mode do you want them? Or do I need to start a new one from scratch or will one which does a little then crashes do?

[http://pastebin.com/GnzMyfh7](http://pastebin.com/GnzMyfh7)

That is after about 1minute of messing about in the space center. Still got a vast file. I shut down steam and restarted before that. The screen shot will not upload to steam, I think that is a steam issue.

[https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100009255243528&sk=photos](https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100009255243528&sk=photos)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-25T16:08:42Z" title="02/25/2015 04:08  PM" data-short="9 yr">February 25, 2015</time> by Tim\_the\_Plumber**

It looks like you might have a corrupted save, indeed. I don't know if they'd be recoverable or not, but even if they are it wouldn't be easy to put them back together.

Does starting a new save fix the problem at all? If not, you may have some kind of permissions issue.

I have tried uninstalling and re-starting from scratch. No joy.

What permissions are er..... ?

This forum keeps asking if I want to leave the page "Any information may be lost" when I have not typed in anything. Is that related?

Have you tested a new savegame? You may find that it works, there seems to be an issue with your current save ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

As for the forum, no it is not related.

> 
> Have you tested a new savegame? You may find that it works, there seems to be an issue with your current save ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
> As for the forum, no it is not related.

Not yet but do I will start a new career and see what happens.... 2 hours later...

Right.

I have attempted to paste the latest fail and now the paste box will not hold it as it's too long. 

Which end of the report do you want?

- - - Updated - - -

And paste bin will not let me log in so here is the end stuff. Is that any good?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-26T16:45:01Z" title="02/26/2015 04:45  PM" data-short="9 yr">February 26, 2015</time> by Claw**

Yes, that helps a lot.

Now that you have posted a log file, I can tell you that your problem fix lies in this thread: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/105651-KSC-Buildings-Lock-Up-Can-t-Click-on-Anything-Firing-Kerbal-Crashes-Game](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/105651-KSC-Buildings-Lock-Up-Can-t-Click-on-Anything-Firing-Kerbal-Crashes-Game)

Cheers,

~Claw
